DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics (PK/PD), safety, and effectiveness of multiple subcutaneous doses of Beloranib (ZGN-440).
DOC.brief_title: ZGN-440 (Beloranib for Subcutaneous Injection) for Treatment of Obesity
DOC.detailed_description: This protocol is designed to test the safety and efficacy of a drug called Beloranib (ZGN-440). It is to be tested for its ability to reduce weight in obese female subjects who are of non-childbearing potential. The study will provide information on how much ZGN-440 gets into the blood, how long it stays in the body, and how it affects other biological markers.
DOC.criteria: Obese but otherwise healthy females Nonchildbearing potential (surgically sterile, postmenopausal, or receiving implanted or injectable contraceptive for at least 3 months) BMI ≥ 30 and ≤ 45 kg/m2 Stable body weight during the past 2 months Use of weight loss agents in the past month History of eating disorder History of type 1 or type 2 diabetes mellitus Current smokers
